project.name: Eve Backend Schema's Bootstrap MatchingRule Registry Implementation
project.shortDescription: Eve Backend Schema's Bootstrap MatchingRule Registry Implementation
project.description:
Eve's backend subsystem contains several components to manage schema objects. One of those components is a OID to MatchingRule registry for schema matchingRule. The registry is responsible for adding new matchingRules by OID as well as enabling the lookup of matchingRules based on OID. This project contains the MatchingRuleRegistry implementation used at server startup rather than the solid state matchingRule registry. The reason for the separate services is to reduce cyclic dependency.
The bootstrap implementation unlike the solid state implementation does not depend on the system backend to store matchingRule information. So this version of the component allows the system backend which depends on schema information to startup without having a cyclic dependency.
